description: These hearty butternut squash home fries are sizzled up in olive oil with onions and spices. A perfect side for a savory fall breakfast!
name: Butternut Squash Home Fries
recipeIngredient: 1 lb. butternut squash (cut into 1/2 inch cubes (about 4 cups)
2 teaspoons old bay seasoning (or just salt and pepper to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and butternut squash, onion and old bay.
Flip a few times to distribute the ingredients and coat everything with oil.
Continue cooking for 15-20 minutes, until squash cubes are browned and tender, flipping every few minutes.
